alert.note: Alert for Butler; Dodge; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 18 at 11:32PM CDT until April 19 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Dodge County in east central Nebraska... Southeastern Butler County in east central Nebraska... Northwestern Saunders County in east central Nebraska... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1131 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Valparaiso, or 15 miles southeast of David City, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 1" hail at Seward at 11:14pm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Weston around 1145 PM CDT. Wahoo, Prague and Malmo around 1150 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Colon, Cedar Bluffs, Leshara and Woodcliff. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
